meleeMod_AirDodge.NAME: Air Dodge

meleeMod_AmsahTech.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] NL Draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust

meleeMod_EdgeGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Kill a non-Elite enemy if it has 50% or less health or an Elite with 35% or less health. NL Exhaust
